app.description: Smart Schedule intelligently optimizes your availability to help you book more appointments.

form.allowSkipBreakTooltip: Allows skipping break when no other has been found
form.preferBackToBackTooltip: Will give higher preference for time slots, that will allow back-to-back appointments
form.preferLaterStartsEarlierEnds: Prefer later starts and earlier ends
form.preferLaterStartsEarlierEndsTooltip: Will give higher preference for time slots, that will allow later starts and earlier ends of the shift
form.allowSmartSlotStartsTooltip: If no allowed slot start times were found, will try to find unconventional time slot
form.preferredServiceTooltip: If selected, will prioritize time slots that will produce maximum number of appointments of the selected service

statusText.error_processing_configuration: Error processing Smart Schedule configuration request
